Designates an asset as either virtual (="yes") or physical

Designates an asset as either publicly accessible (="yes") or not
			(="no").

ip-address.name: ip-address
ip-address.description: Use the @type flag to deisgnate IPv4 or IPv6.

dns-name.name: dns-name
dns-name.description: If available, state the DNS name or URL of the inventory item. This can be leftblank if one does not exist, or it is a dynamic field.

netbios-name.name: netbios-name
netbios-name.description: If available, state the NetBIOS name of the inventory item. This can be omittedif one does not exist, or it is a dynamic field.

mac-address.name: mac-address
mac-address.description: If available, state the MAC Address of the inventory item. This can be leftblank if one does not exist, or it is a dynamic field.

authenticated-scan.name: authenticated-scan
authenticated-scan.description: Indicate whether this asset is planned for authenticatedscanning.

location.name: location
location.description: Physical location of hardware. Could include Data Center ID, Cage#, Rack# orother meaningful location identifiers.

asset-type.name: asset-type
asset-type.description: Simple description of the asset's function (e.g., Router, Storage Array, DNSServer, etc.) Do not use vendor or product names here.
